member.name: T:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strDefQuitMsg
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Best Chat user {1} has left {2}..

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnAutoReconnectName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Reconnect when disconnected unexpectedly.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnAutoReconnectToolTipText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to When your connection is lost unexpectedly, Best Chat can automatically reconnect to the server for you..

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnCharEncodingName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to C_haracter Encoding.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnCharEncodingToolTipName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to For multiple clients to correctly read messages with non-ASCII characters on IRC, they need to use the same character encoding..

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnDefQuitMsgName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Default Quit _Message.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnDefQuitMsgToolTipText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Specifies a default quit message to use when on is not explicitly specified for a network or via the /quit command..

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnEnableIdentName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enable _Identification Server during connection process.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnEnableIdentToolTipText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Allows Best Chat to connect to servers that require an ident response.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnMaxAttemptsName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Maximum Connection _Attempts:.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnMaxAttemptsToolTipText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This is number of times Best Chat attempts to connect to a server or network. A value of 1 means Best Chat will never attempt to reconnect to the server..

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to _Connection.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnRejoinAfterKickName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to R_ejoin when kicked.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnRejoinAfterKickToolTipText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to If this is turned on, Best Chat will try (only once) to rejoin a channel you got kicked from. Note: Some channels dislike auto-rejoin and will ban you. So be careful..

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnToolTipText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to These preferences affect how Best Chat connects to the Internet..

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnUnlimitedAttemptsName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unlimited Attempts?.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralConnUnlimitedAttemptsToolTipText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to If checked, Best Chat will attempt to reconnect to any server forever. If unchecked, the limit will be to the right..

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to _General.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalGeneralToolTipText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Many preferences that don't have anywhere else go here..

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to _Global.

member.name: P:BestChat.Prefs.Data.Resources.strGlobalNameToolTipText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to These preferences affect the entire application..
